name: T.Blocks: Puzzle Game
description:
Are you looking for a new puzzle game block challenge?
Then you’ll love T.Blocks. Read more on how you can enjoy this challenging puzzle game!

T.Blocks is a puzzle game with sleek dark-themed graphics and futuristic design. It is based on the well known hit with a small variation. Featuring 2 game modes, T.Blocks is a must-try for the puzzle block gaming fans!

Normal or Survive Mode
From the main menu you can choose to play the normal or survival mode. Normal mode is a level based mode with challenges. The challenges are displayed prior playing and you need to complete them as fast as possible.

In survive mode you are playing a high score mode where you need to keep the whole grid without blocks as long as possible. Once you have filled it completely and there are no more moves, the puzzle game is over.

The blocks are easy to control with cursor buttons which are located at the bottom. Also the sophisticated design and cool sound effects sum up perfectly to the overall great quality of the game. So, if you are in search of a new puzzle game, T.Blocks is a must! Try it for free on Google Play.

Features at a glance:
▪️ free puzzle game
▪️ dark futuristic graphics and design
▪️ 2 game modes
▪️ modern soundtrack and effects
▪️ fading effect of where the blocks will exactly fall
▪️ easy controls with cursors
